rukus.text: 19|66|arau manuhe kaya, ‘ma'i mrtyubarana karaile moka akau jiraita arasthata uthoraa ha’ba neki’
19|67|manuhe smarana nakarae neki ye, ami taka iyara purbe srsti karaicho athaca si ekorae'i nachila
19|68|Eteke tomara pratipalakara sapata! Arasye ami sihamtaka arau cayatanasakalaka ekelage samabeta karaima, tara pichata ami sihamtaka natajanu arasthata jahannamara carai'ophale upasthita karaima.
19|69|Tara pichata pratyeka dalara majara paraa yijana rahamanara sarbadhika abadhya ami taka tani uliya'i anima.
19|70|Arau amihe bhalakai jano sihamtaka, yisakala jahannamata dagdha horaara bechi upayukta.
19|71|Arau tomalokara pratyeke'i tara (jahannamara) oparaedi atikrama karaiba; e'ito tomara pratipalakara curanta sid'dhanta.
19|72|Tara pichata ami ud'dhara karaima te'omlokaka, yisakale takbaraa aralambana karaiche arau yalimasakalaka tata natajanu arasthata raakhi dima.

19|73|Arau sihamtara ocarata amara spasta ayatasamuha tilarata karaa ha’le kaphirasakale muminasakalaka kaya, ‘(amara) du'i dalara majata maryadata kona sraestha arau kara sabha bechi jakajamakatapurna’
19|74|arau sihamtara purbe ami bahu manaragosthika binasa karaicho—yisakala sihamtatakai sampada arau bahyadrstita sraestha achila.

19|75|Koraa, ‘yisakale bibhraantita ache, parama karaunamaye sihamtaka pracura arakasa diba, arasesata yetiya sihamte seya pratyaksabharae dekhibalai paba yi bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haichila, seya sastiye'i ha'omka ba kiyamate'i ha'omka, tetiyahe sihamte janibalai paba maryadara ksetrata kona nikrsta arau dalabalara ksetrata kona durbala’.

19|76|Arau yisakale satpathata cale allahe te'omlokara hidayata brd'dhi karai diye; arau sthayi satkarmasamuha tomara pratipalakara puraskara praaptira babe sraestha arau parainatira phalerae'o ati uttama.
19|77|Tumi se'ijana byaktika dekhichane, yiye amara ayatasamuha asbikara karae arau kaya, ‘arasye moka dhana-sampada arau santana-santati diya ha’ba’.
19|78|Si gayeba samparke arahita haiche neki, ne rahamanara paraa kono pratisrauti labha karaiche
19|79|ketiya'o nahaya, si yi kaya ami seya likhi raakhima arau tara sasti brd'dhihe karai thakima.
19|80|Arau si yi (dhana-sampada, janabalara katha) kaya, (tara mrtyura pichata) seya thakiba amara adhikarata arau si akalasaraiya hai amara ocarata upasthita habahi.
19|81|Arau sihamte allahara bahirae bahuto ilaha grahana karaiche, yate se'ibora sihamtara sahayaka haya
19|82|ketiya'o nahaya, anatipalame sihamte (upasyaborae) sihamtara ibadata asbikara karaiba arau sihamtara biraodhi hai yaba.
